attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Blair has signally failed to maintain the trust of the electorate over Iraq, top-up fees and cash for honours. He is now being regularly visited by the police. Having elided the distinction between suspicion and guilt in many criminal cases, he should follow his own logic and stand down for the good of the nation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
